text.autoconfig.mcutil.option.showTabSki: Show Tab Menu Heads in Offline Mode
text.autoconfig.mcutil.option.alwaysAllo: Allow the tab list even while alone in a singleplayer world
text.autoconfig.mcutil.option.connection: Connection Timeout (seconds, or 0 to remove timeout)
text.autoconfig.mcutil.option.notRespond: Display how long it has been since the server sent a packet
